attributes.action: Enforce a motorcycle passing lane on motorways and 'A' roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A lane dedicated for motorcycles incorporating part of the hard shoulder for motorcycles to use in times when there is congestion.
If the motorcycle rider can see that the hard shoulder is being utilized then they will have to filter back into the traffic lanes until the obstacle has been passed.
This would virtually eradicate the need for motorcycles to weave between traffic, would ensure a safe place for motorcycles to pass at a restricted speed, and would keep motorists segregated from motorcycles in areas where the traffic has built up.

Motorcyclist are not looking for their own lane, they are asking for a safe lane for use at certain periods of congestion ONLY.

Thank you for your cooperation.
